formattedAddress: 353 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 353 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text:
Dr Mekles is extremely professional and thorough. I especially appreciate his willingess to schedule appointments around my work schedule. He is very thoughtful and considerate of his patients needs.
Dr. Todd Mekles is an exceptional Psychiatrist who provides the empathy and patient care that I have been seeking. In addition to his professional knowledge, he is an avid listener who provides a safe, trustworthy and reassuring space for his patients. I genuinely recommend Dr. Mekles who is willing to be flexible in scheduling around his patients needs and demonstrates that he is "always there for his patients".

originalText.text: Dr. Mekles is really down to earth, he’s exactly what I’m looking for in a psychiatrist, I have his personal number for “emergencies” only he’s very responsible and responsive to his phone. His office is immaculate, clean, and he always has fresh lifesavers waiting for me. His schedule is always available and his virtual visits work great with my schedule. Thank you for changing my negative perspective on psychiatrists.

originalText.text:
I cannot express enough gratitude to Dr. Meckles.  His expertise and dedication have made a profound impact, not only on my life but also on one of my closest friends who referred me. His ability to provide comfort and healing during my times of need have been nothing short of lifesaving.

Despite a busy practice, he graciously accepted me as a new patient, for which I am eternally thankful.

If you’re considering Dr. Meckles and can get in with him for your  care, I highly recommend seizing the opportunity. It’s a decision you definitely won’t regret.

originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of seeing Dr. Mekles for around four years, and  I can confidently say that he's an excellent psychiatrist who truly cares about their patients. From the moment I first met him, I felt welcomed and at ease. Dr. Mekles always takes the time to listen to my concerns and constantly works with me to adjust my treatment plan based on what my issues are at the time. He's always available 24/7, which is a blessing since I often have to reschedule or cancel appointments based on my work schedule.

What sets Dr. Mekles apart is his empathetic nature. He has always made me feel heard and validated, and I never felt rushed during our appointments. His expertise and knowledge are evident; he was the first doctor to give me a diagnosis that aligned with what I was constantly experiencing.

Overall, I highly recommend Dr. Mekles to anyone seeking effective psychiatric care. He's an excellent doctor who goes above and beyond for their patients.

originalText.text: Dr.Meckles is great. He goes above and beyond for his patients and understands what you’re currently going through. He does his best to make your situation better and works diligently to get your to where you need to be in order to be your very best.
